verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: During a state visit last week] , [ARG0: French President Emmanuel Macron and US President Donald Trump] [V: planted] [ARG1: a tree that Macron brought as a gift] . But on Saturday , ph

During a state visit last week , French President Emmanuel Macron and US President Donald Trump planted [ARG1: a tree] [R-ARG1: that] [ARG0: Macron] [V: brought] [ARGM-MNR: as a gift] . But on Saturday , ph
